channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Traffic - FATALITY; INC#1600; 08:55PM; 13201 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3v4GGKg; Sun Valley; Multi-vehicle collision with one fatality (age/gender unknown) and four patients with minor injuries. LAPD Inc# 3772; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC14 E102 E239 E289 E290 E39 E89 EM14 RA39 RA89 T39 T89 T90; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0405; 06:58AM; 12321 W Riverside Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TrpAAg; Valley Village; KNOCKDOWN: 48 firefighters extinguished the attic fire in 23 minutes. The fire was contained to the attic in one corner of the building. Salvage operations were conducted in the units below to protect against water damage. No further details.; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E102 E260 E278 E288 E289 E60 E86 E89 E97 EM14 RA60 RA78 RA878 SO1 T60 T78 T88 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0405; 06:35AM; 12321 W Riverside Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TrpAAg; Valley Village; 4 story apartment building (3 residential over parking) with an attic fire in one corner of the building. One patient being assessed for possible smoke inhalation. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 E102 E260 E278 E288 E289 E60 E86 E89 E97 RA78 RA878 T60 T78 T88 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1281; 04:32PM; 1647 W 80th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/48lIE7q; Manchester Square; KNOCKDOWN: 44 firefighters extinguished the fire in 11 minutes. They contained the fire to the unit of origin. LAFD Arson investigator being attached for possible suspect on scene. One patient being assessed (approx 30yo F) with burn injuries. No further details.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 BC17 E21 E233 E264 E266 E38 E57 E61 E66 RA57 RA846 T33 T64 T66; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1281; 04:21PM; 1647 W 80th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/48lIE7q; Manchester Square; Two story apartment building with smoke showing from one unit on the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 BC17 E21 E264 E266 E38 E57 E61 E66 RA57 RA846 T64 T66; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Traffic; INC#1206; 03:39PM; 270 S Loma Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TtebQx; Westlake; MTA bus rolled back into a retaining wall (minor damage). Four patients (including the driver of the bus) requesting LAFD transport for minor, non-life threatening injuries. LAPD Inc# 2844. No further details. ; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 E203 E3 EM1 EM11 RA20 RA804 RA811 RA813 RA900 T3; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0844; 01:46PM; 911 E 59th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/4751U85; Florence; KNOCKDOWN: Over 80 firefighters extinguished the fire in one hour and 18 minutes with no injuries reported. There are still numerous smoldering piles and smoke will be visible throughout the overhaul operation. LAFD Heavy Equipment, including the RS3 Robotic Firefighting Vehicle, are responding to move debris and allow firefighters to ensure all hot spots are out and no smoldering remains. This will remain an active scene for an several hours and drivers are asked to continue to avoid the area of E 59th St between Central Ave and Avalon Blvd. No further details.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC4 CM22 CM31 E14 E15 E203 E21 E215 E221 E226 E229 E233 E235 E264 E266 E27 E295 E3 E33 E46 E57 E66 E95 EA1 EM13 EM9 HR3 RA15 RA33 RA803 RA814 RA833 RS3 SO1 SQ21 SQ95 T15 T21 T26 T29 T3 T33 T35 T64 T66 T9 T95 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0844; 01:08PM; 911 E 59th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/4751U85; Florence; Firefighters are making progress. The building is a large commercial property with a division wall separating the front from the back (A from the C side) and crews are working to keep the fire from extending beyond the wall. There is a 2nd building exposed and firefighters continue working to defend that building. There is a junk yard adjacent with some extension to (possibly) two vehicles but no structure. ; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC4 CM22 E14 E15 E203 E21 E215 E221 E226 E229 E233 E235 E264 E266 E27 E295 E3 E33 E46 E57 E66 E95 EA1 EM13 EM9 HR3 RA15 RA33 RA803 RA814 RA833 SO1 SQ21 SQ95 T15 T21 T26 T29 T3 T33 T35 T64 T66 T9 T95 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0844; 12:48PM; 911 E 59th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/4751U85; Florence; This is now at the Major Emergency structure fire level with two additional task forces enroute. Firefighters are working to defend commercial property on the Bravo (West) side of the fire building. There are no injuries reported. LACoFD remains on scene assisting. Drivers are requested to avoid the area of Central / Slauson / 59th Street / Avalon due to emergency operations and hose lines on the streets. ; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC4 CM22 E14 E203 E21 E215 E221 E226 E233 E266 E27 E295 E33 E46 E57 E66 E95 EM13 EM9 HR3 RA15 RA33 RA814 SQ21 SQ95 T15 T21 T26 T3 T33 T66 T9 T95 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0844; 12:28PM; 911 E 59th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/4751U85; Florence; One story, commercial fire with heavy fire showing upon arrival. Firefighters are in the defensive mode. LACoFD is also on scene assisting. There is an additional building exposed to the fire on at least one side.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM22 E14 E21 E215 E221 E233 E266 E33 E66 EM13 RA15 RA33 RA814 SQ21 T15 T21 T33 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
